title: Week 4 Mistakes
description:
Pablo Torre, Domonique Foxworth and Bill Barnwell debate if they learned more about the Chiefs’ offense or the Bucs’ defense on SNF, if John Harbaugh blew it by deciding to go for it on 4th-and-goal and if Kenny Pickett should have been starting sooner.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: (debatable): Should Pickett Have Been Starting Sooner? Baltimore 4th-and-goal Mistake?
